CannabinoidsCannabis leaf (1).svg
Phytocannabinoids
Quasi-psychedelic THC* cannabinoids, and cannabi* (CB*) substances that can be converted to quasi-psychedelic THC* cannabinoids (for example CBD, and CBDP can be converted with citric acid to THC, and THCP, respectively):

Cannabidiol (CBD)
Cannabidiolic acid (CBDA)
Cannabidihexol (CBDH)
Cannabidiphorol (CBDP)
Tetrahydrocannabinol (THC, Delta-9-THC)
Tetrahydrocannabinolic acid (THCA)
Tetrahydrocannabihexol (THCH)
Tetrahydrocannabiphorol (THCP)
Synthetic cannabinoids
4F-ADB (4F-MDMB-BINACA, 4F-MDMB-BUTINACA)

5F-PB-22
AB-FUBINACA
APICA (2NE1)
EG-018

STS-135

THJ-2201
